Who is the target audience for the Verus monthly recap?

The target audience for the Verus monthly recap includes anyone who wants to stay updated on Verus and its ecosystem without having to follow social media or Discord channels daily. This includes people who want to have a life outside of following Verus's updates and still receive occasional updates.

Title: August 2021— Verus Monthly Recap
Article URL: https://medium.com/veruscoin/august-2021-verus-monthly-recap-4241c7c80b8a
Content:August 2021— Verus Monthly Recap
Filling the information gap. Subscribe to the newsletter. This is for you who doesn’t want to read through all the messages on Discord everyday (where all the latest project information can be found.) For you who can’t be bothered with following social media. For you who just generally wants to have a life and still get the occasional updates on Verus and its ecosystem. And everyone else is welcome too.
